prompts.title: Hotel Lobby VIP Escort
prompts.task: Initiate social navigation mode. Start at the main revolving door entrance (Point A) and navigate to the concierge desk (Point B) located 15 meters North. The path is populated with dynamic agents (hotel guests) standing in clusters. Maintain a strictly enforced social safety buffer of 1.2 meters from all humans. Detect and yield to a luggage trolley moving tangentially from the left. Optimize path smoothness to minimize accelerations (jerk < 0.5 m/sÂ³) to project a calm, high-end service demeanor.

prompts.title: Urban Sidewalk Delivery
prompts.task: Traverse the city sidewalk segment (50m stretch). Semantic segmentation must identify: 'pavement' (traversable), 'road' (forbidden), 'curb' (drop-off hazard), and 'pole' (static obstacle). Execute a local avoidance maneuver around the red fire hydrant while remaining strictly within the pavement boundaries (+/- 10cm safety margin from curb). Slow down to 0.5m/s when passing the building entrance to scan for emerging pedestrians.

prompts.title: Fine-Grained Restaurant Pathing
prompts.task: Navigate the 'Wait-Staff' robot from the kitchen pass to Table 4. The available corridor width is restricted to 65cm due to occupied chairs. Use LiDAR and RGB-D fusion to precisely map the chair legs. Perform a strafing maneuever if necessary to clear the narrowest point without contacting any furniture. DO NOT disturb the hanging tablecloths. Stop immediately if a guest stands up.

prompts.title: Micro-soldering Quality Control
prompts.task: Position the end-effector camera at a 45-degree angle relative to the green PCB. Engage macro-focus mode. Locate the designated component 'R201' (0402 resistor). use visual servoing to center the component. Analyze the solder joint fillets for 'cold solder' signatures (dull/granular texture vs shiny). If defect found, tag location in the CAD coordinate frame.

prompts.title: Data Center Cable Remediation
prompts.task: Identify the disconnected blue CAT6 ethernet cable hanging in Rack Unit 14. Compute a 6-DOF grasp pose for the connector head, avoiding the locking clip to prevent damage. Plan a collision-free arm trajectory to insert the connector into Switch Port 12. Apply a linear force of 15N to click it into place, then reverse 2mm to verify latch engagement.

prompts.title: Domestic Laundry Sorting
prompts.task: Segment the pile of laundry on the bed. Isolate the 'red t-shirt'. Calculate a grasp point on the fabric centroid to ensure stability. Lift the item using a pinch grasp. Classify the material type (Cotton). Rotate 90 degrees and release the item into the 'Colors' hamper, strictly avoiding the 'Whites' hamper. Ignore the white socks nearby.

prompts.title: Semantic Housekeeping Assessment
prompts.task: Perform a semantic scan of the Airbnb living room. Categorize all detected ground objects into two classes: 'Trash' (e.g., soda cans, wrappers) and 'Personal Belongings' (e.g., clothes, electronics). Generate a cleaning plan that involves picking up 'Trash' objects while strictly geofencing 'Personal Belongings' as 'Do Not Touch' zones. Output the centroid coordinates of the soda can.

prompts.title: Retail Planogram Compliance
prompts.task: Traverse the cereal aisle at a constant velocity of 0.2 m/s. Capture high-res frames of Shelf B. Run Object Detection to count the facing stock of 'Corn Flakes'. Compare the detected count (e.g., 3) against the database expectation (e.g., 5). Flag the gap location. Verify if the price tag '2.99' matches the product above it using OCR.

prompts.title: Volumetric Hazard Mapping
prompts.task: Survey the disaster rubble zone using LiDAR. Generate a 2.5D elevation map. Classify terrain patches by traversability cost: 'Safe' (flat concrete), 'Risky' (gravel/loose debris), and 'Impassable' (large drop-offs > 30cm). Identify the void space beneath the collapsed slab as a potential survivor location. Estimate the volume of the void.
